conbody.p: Download the Miramo DITA-OT plugin ZIP file from www.miramo.com into a temporary folder tmpdir, then run the 'dita -install MiramoDITA-OTplugin<vs>.zip' command to install and register the plugin with the DITA-OT, for example:
This will create a new folder, dita-ot-installdir/plugins/com.miramo.mmpdf
See www.dita-ot.org for more information on installing and integrating DITA-OT plugins.
